description: <p>Are you a proactive maintenance person with a wide range of practical skills who could help maintain a Grade II Listed building? Not only will you carry out a variety of maintenance tasks, you’ll oversee volunteers and contractors ensuring work is carried out with minimal disruption.<br /><br />Stagenhoe is a Sue Ryder specialist neurological care centre based in Hertfordshire, caring for people aged 18 and over who have life-changing conditions affecting the brain and nervous system. We are here for people with degenerative conditions which get worse over time - such as Huntington's disease, motor neurone disease, multiple sclerosis and Parkinson's disease - as well as those with acquired conditions resulting from a brain or spinal injury or stroke.<br /><br />Responsibilities will include:<br /><br />•Carry out maintenance duties including basic electrical, painting, plumbing and carpentry<br />•To ensure work spaces are kept clean, clear and free of obstruction<br />•Carry out periodic inspections and checks and update the maintenance schedule<br />•Assist in the supervision and management of external contractors<br />•Carry out removal of waste and maintain the refuse area<br />•Ensure all work complies with Sue Ryder policies, Care Standards and other regulations and requirements<br />•Ensure due attention to health and safety matters whilst carrying out any works<br /><br />It's an exciting time to join Sue Ryder and to hit the ground running ideally you will have knowledge of Health and Safety, COSSH and other relevant legislation<br /><br />Skills required:<br /><br />•Skilled in a range of minor maintenance procedures<br />•Able to work within policies and procedures<br />•Be able to communicate effectively verbally and in writing<br />•Demonstrable skills in supervising others<br />•Hold a PAT certificate or be prepared to undertake training<br />•Ability to work closely with service users and communicate effectively with them<br />•Hold a valid driving license<br /><br />*Competitive Benefits Package* – enhanced payments for unsocial hours, generous holiday entitlement, private pension, staff discount with thousands of retailers, 15% off New Goods and lots more. For a full list of employee benefits please visit our main careers webpage.<br /><br />Due to the remote location of Stagenhoe your own transport is essential.</p>
title: Maintenance Assistant
